english.segment1: don't try to hide. the mistakes i made this time. but please try and listen. cus i'm breaking my heart tonight. so you can see whats inside. cus wherever you go, well that's where i'll go. i'd do so much i'll show but you won't know. so heres a song to show for the things ive blown. but im sorry so.. thats the only way that i know
english.segment2: and all ive learned is. what we hate we make, what we hate we make. theres no time for hating but what we hate we make
english.segment3: something is about to change. i can feel it in my heart today. and you know its not the first time. but i bet it won't be the same. cus right now im at an all time low. so heres a song just so you won't go. cus that the only thing that i know
english.segment4: and i will start with a verse. then a bridge, write a chorus. so we all can sing along. with everythign we got. but between you and me this song would be. written for us but i know thats not enough. to say im sorry
english.segment5: what we hate we make, what we hate we make. theres no time for hating but what we hate we make
english.segment6: and you will know what you will be. and yeah, you will know what you mean to me. yeah you will know that truthfully. i am sorry.
